data.enText: a substance, produced by all living things, which helps a chemical change happen or happen more quickly, without being changed itself

simple_means.memory_skill: en 使… + zym 发酵 + e → 使发酵 → 酶

tr: any of several complex proteins that are produced by cells and act as catalysts in specific biochemical reactions

value.def: An enzyme is a chemical substance that is found in living creatures which produces changes in other substances without being changed itself.

partsOfSpeech.dec: en 使… + zym 发酵 + e → 使发酵 → 酶
zymo〔= zym〕发酵 + gen 产生 → 产生发酵 → 发酵性细菌
zymogen 酵源；发酵性细菌 + ic …的 → 酵母质的，发酵菌的
zym 发酵 + ology …学 → 发酵学
